body.p:
To The Honorable Beriah McGoffin
Govenor of Kentucky

Your Petitioners James A. Johnson Became the security of Benjamin Greer for his appearance to the November Term of the Caldwell Circuit Court ^1861^ in a Bond of one hundred dollars to answer to the commonwealth of Kentucky for an Assault upon -- -- your Petitioner states that said Greer failed to make his appearance and and at the June Term of the Caldwell Circuit Court 1862 said Bond being forfeited Judgement was rendered against your Petitioner your Petitioner states that one E. Owen was his co surety for said Greer and said Owen is now dead and is is hopelessly insolvent and left the whole liability upon your Petitioner Johnson wherefore we the undersigned pray your Excelency to remit said liability and for all proper relief &c

James S. Loney
Conrad Rohrback
W, H, Calven
G W Barbour
D. Copeland
F. P. Roscoe
L Pepper
E P Watkins
D. Leech
J M Leech J P C C
T. W Pickery

Caldwell Cir Ct
$100 } Recog
Jas A. Johnson
Remission Issd Aug 18th 1862
